extendedInfo.description: We are as concerned as you are about the possibility of the advent of the zombie apocalypse.  And we want to make sure it doesn't blindside us.  Zombie Watchdog is scouring the internet for signs of it beginning...whether it comes from a viral pandemic, the gates of hell breaking open, a mad scientist, or one of a myriad of other possibilities we have anticipated.  We are on the watch!With this app, you can view the current Zombie Apocalypse Safety System alert level in your geographical region at any time.  It will also immediately notify you when the alert level is increased so you can arm yourself as appropriate!The Zombie Apocalypse Safety System is based on a complex algorithm that utilizes world-wide RSS news feeds, Google search trends, Twitter trends, and many other sources of information to ferret out exactly what is happening all over the world.  The Zombie Watchdog sifts through all of this data for warning signs that the undead are beginning to stir.For many more features, check out Zombie Watchdog Veteran:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.chillemstudios.zombiewatchdogveteranv1.7Full API handling overhaul to improve system speed and stability.Improved slider sensitivity and response in demo mode.Notification bar alerts are now removed when viewing alert or tip.Volume is not increased when headphones are plugged in.Alerts play on tablets and other devices that do not have STREAM_RING volume setting.Added various other tablet compatibility enhancements.Added many ICS and JB compatibility enhancements.Removed Cyberbounty ad-wall and its required permissions.F.A.Q:Q: I've got the app installed, now what do I do?A: Prepare yourself and wait for instructions.  The Zombie Watchdog will do the rest.  When the alert level in your region is raised you will receive a notification with further instruction and suggestions on what to do.Q: How do I know what caused the alert level to change?A: Visit the Zombie Watchdog website to look for alert notices and read the news articles.  A Veteran version of Zombie Watchdog is also available which includes a news article reader; get it at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.chillemstudios.zombiewatchdogveteranQ: Do you truly believe zombies are real?A: Zombies are as real as you believe they are, and of course the definition may vary.  They may not be actual risen dead, but rather the result of a horrible new strain of virus or the next generation of biological warfare.Q: Is this serious?A: Is getting your face chewed off by a zombie serious? Our research has indicated that the Zombie Apocalypse is on the horizon and we want as many of you alive to help in the fight as possible. This is deadly serious.Q: My country/state/city isn't covered!A: Of course it is! The whole world is watched by Zombie Watchdog!  To find out what region you are part of, go to our website at http://www.zombiewatchdog.com and click on your country on the map.  A box will appear that will tell you which region it is part of and the current alert level for that region.Q: Who is Sadie?A: Sadie is the zombie watchdog.  She is the highly trained animal you see in the picture above.

reviews.title: Wow come on..
reviews.comment: Im not going to lie..zombies scare the crap out of me. So when u put the alarm on outbreak it gets me worried!! Plz put whats going on so just incase something does happen I will know where they r at.
reviews.author: MaKayla O\'Neal

reviews.title: About dam time
reviews.comment: About time people get somthing like this in the world like i always say it most likely wont be living dead but a viruse that will do this im ready locked and loaded lets do it

reviews.title: Annoying

reviews.comment: 5 stars here guys. Love this app..

reviews.title: Good idea, but not working
reviews.comment: Like another commenter, I installed the app to find my region says \"Outbreak\" for no apparent reason. The website shows all clear, so what the hell?

reviews.comment: I downloaded this app for my LG optimus and I just can\'t get it to work.. But I love the idea of this app.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Now I don\'t have to worry about zombies.
